rt @eric_lanlard: while we wait for the scones to cool, here are the poll results ...
61% jam first, cream second
39% cream first, jam seco‚Ä¶
rt @eric_lanlard: step 5: bake for 10-12 minutes at 200c until risen and golden. cool on a wire rack. #teawitheric @twitterfood https://t.c‚Ä¶
rt @eric_lanlard: step 4: roll dough to thickness of 3cm. cut out the scones (don‚Äôt twist the cutter!) place on baking tray and glaze. http‚Ä¶
rt @eric_lanlard: step 3: turn the dough onto a lightly floured surface. knead the mixture just 3-4 times to get rid of the cracks. https:/‚Ä¶
rt @eric_lanlard: step 2: mix buttermilk &amp; milk. add to flour, combine into a smooth doughnut. add any extra elements. #teawitheric https:/‚Ä¶
